pages.title: If You See the Watcher
pages.text: 1) Create distance. 2) Keep an exit route in view. 3) Do not corner yourself underground. 4) Reposition to known terrain. 5) Secure your spawn point before any re-engagement.

pages.title: Win Condition
pages.text: There is no guaranteed victory condition against the protocol. Survival means managing escalation, preserving mobility, and recognizing when total withdrawal from a world is the rational decision.
